careers.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
careers.description: Responsible for protecting information systems from cyber threats, identifying vulnerabilities, and managing security technologies.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
Minimum 3 years of experience in cybersecurity.
Strong knowledge of firewalls, encryption, and intrusion detection systems.

careers.title: AI Research Scientist
careers.description: Developing and advancing AI technologies, focusing on machine learning, neural networks, and cognitive computing.
requirements: PhD in Computer Science, AI, or related field.
Proven track record of research in AI and machine learning.
Experience with Python, TensorFlow, and other AI tools and frameworks.

careers.title: Urban Infrastructure Engineer
careers.description: Designing and implementing smart city solutions, focusing on sustainability, efficiency, and integration of advanced technologies.
requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering or Urban Planning.
Experience in urban infrastructure projects, smart city technologies.
Strong analytical and project management skills.

careers.title: Quantum Computing Specialist
careers.description: Working on the forefront of quantum computing, developing algorithms and applications for next-generation computing systems.
requirements: Master's degree in Computer Science, Physics, or related field.
Experience in quantum computing or related research.
Proficient in programming languages like Q#, Python, and C++.

careers.title: Cybernetic Technician
careers.description: Installation, maintenance, and repair of cybernetic implants and devices, ensuring they meet Arasaka's high-quality standards.
requirements: Degree in Biomedical Engineering, Electronic Engineering, or related field.
Experience with cybernetic or bionic technology.
Excellent problem-solving and technical skills.

careers.title: Virtual Reality Interface Designer
careers.description: Designing and developing immersive VR environments for training and simulation, utilizing cutting-edge VR technology and user interface design principles.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Computer Science, or related field.
Experience with VR platforms and 3D modeling tools.
Strong portfolio showcasing VR design skills.

careers.title: Ethical Hacker
careers.description: Performing penetration testing and vulnerability assessments on Arasaka's digital infrastructure, ensuring the highest level of security against cyber threats.
requirements: Certification in ethical hacking (CEH, OSCP, or equivalent).
Proven experience in penetration testing and cybersecurity.
In-depth knowledge of network security protocols and hacking techniques.

careers.title: Neuro-Interface Programmer
careers.description: Developing and programming advanced neuro-interfaces, contributing to innovations in brain-computer interface technologies.
requirements: Master's degree in Neuroscience, Computer Science, or related field.
Experience with neural networks and brain-computer interfacing.
Proficiency in programming languages like Python, R, and MATLAB.

careers.title: Drone Surveillance Operator
careers.description: Operating and maintaining a fleet of high-tech surveillance drones for security and reconnaissance missions.
requirements: Diploma in Electronics, Robotics, or related field.
Experience in drone operation and maintenance.
Ability to work in high-pressure, security-sensitive environments.

careers.title: Space Operations Director
careers.description: Overseeing operations of Arasaka's orbital facilities and space missions, coordinating with international space agencies and private partners.
requirements: Degree in Aerospace Engineering, Astrophysics, or related field.
Significant experience in space operations and management.
Strong leadership skills and ability to manage interdisciplinary teams.

careers.title: Biotech Research Scientist
careers.description: Conducting cutting-edge research in biotechnology, focusing on gene editing, regenerative medicine, and synthetic biology.
requirements: PhD in Biotechnology, Molecular Biology, or related field.
Research experience in gene editing technologies and biotech innovations.
Ability to work in a highly collaborative research environment.

careers.title: Cryptocurrency Analyst
careers.description: Analyzing market trends in cryptocurrency, developing strategies for blockchain investments and digital asset management.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Economics, or related field.
Strong understanding of cryptocurrency markets and blockchain technology.
Experience with financial modeling and data analysis.

careers.title: Advanced Materials Scientist
careers.description: Developing new materials with enhanced properties for use in military, aerospace, and consumer electronics applications.
requirements: PhD in Materials Science, Chemistry, or related field.
Expertise in nanotechnology, polymer science, or composite materials.
Proven track record of innovative research in advanced materials.

careers.title: Corporate Espionage Agent
careers.description: Conducting covert operations to gather intelligence and protect Arasaka's corporate interests against competitors.
requirements: Background in intelligence, military, or law enforcement.
Skilled in surveillance, data extraction, and covert operations.
High level of discretion and adherence to ethical guidelines.

careers.title: Exoskeleton Engineer
careers.description: Designing and developing advanced exoskeleton systems for industrial, military, and medical applications.
requirements: Master's degree in Mechanical Engineering, Robotics, or related field.
Experience in designing wearable robotic systems.
Proficiency in CAD software and knowledge of biomechanics.

careers.title: Urban Drone Traffic Controller
careers.description: Managing and monitoring drone traffic in urban airspace, ensuring safe and efficient operation of delivery and surveillance drones.
requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Aviation, Aerospace Engineering, or related field.
Knowledge of UAV systems and air traffic control protocols.
Strong decision-making and communication skills.

careers.title: Holographic Interface Designer
careers.description: Creating innovative holographic interfaces and experiences for entertainment, advertising, and educational applications.
requirements: Degree in Graphic Design, Interaction Design, or related field.
Experience with 3D modeling and animation, AR/VR technologies.
Strong portfolio showcasing holographic and interactive design work.

careers.title: Nano-Technology Engineer
careers.description: Developing and implementing nanotechnology solutions for use in electronics, healthcare, and material sciences.
requirements: PhD in Nanotechnology, Physics, or related field.
Experience in nanofabrication and nanomaterials.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

careers.title: Underwater Systems Specialist
careers.description: Designing and maintaining advanced underwater vehicles and systems for exploration and security purposes.
requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Marine Engineering or Oceanography.
Experience with underwater robotics and sonar technology.
Ability to work in challenging and remote marine environments.

careers.title: Augmented Reality Developer
careers.description: Creating cutting-edge augmented reality applications for commercial, educational, and entertainment purposes.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
Strong experience with AR platforms and 3D programming.
Creative thinker with a portfolio of AR projects.

careers.title: Anti-Hacking Systems Analyst
careers.description: Developing and implementing strategies to counteract and prevent hacking attempts on Arasaka’s networks and systems.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in IT Security or related field.
Proven experience in anti-hacking techniques and cybersecurity.
Strong knowledge of network infrastructure and security protocols.

careers.title: Futuristic City Planner
careers.description: Planning and designing sustainable, high-tech cities with a focus on innovation, efficiency, and quality of life.
requirements: Master’s degree in Urban Planning or Architecture.
Experience in futuristic or smart city projects.
Visionary thinking with strong project management skills.

careers.title: Off-World Colonization Expert
careers.description: Leading projects focused on the colonization of other planets and moons, including habitat design, life support systems, and sustainable development.
requirements: Advanced degree in Aerospace Engineering, Astrobiology, or related field.
Experience in space habitat design and off-world living conditions.
Strong leadership and adaptability to extreme environments.

careers.title: Cybersecurity Threat Analyst
careers.description: Analyzing and responding to cybersecurity threats in Night City's dynamic urban landscape.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in IT Security or related field.
Experience in urban cybersecurity and threat analysis.
Familiarity with advanced security protocols and systems.

careers.title: Urban Drone Coordinator
careers.description: Coordinating and managing drone operations for surveillance and delivery in Night City.
requirements: Degree in Aeronautics or Robotics.
Experience in UAV or drone traffic management.
Strong organizational and communication skills.

careers.title: Neural Network Programmer
careers.description: Developing innovative neural network solutions for cybernetic enhancements and interfaces.
requirements: Bachelor's in Computer Science, AI, or related field.
Expertise in neural networks and machine learning.
Experience in neurotechnology and cybernetics.

careers.title: AR Urban Experience Designer
careers.description: Designing state-of-the-art augmented reality experiences for urban environments.
requirements: Degree in Graphic Design, UX/UI, or related field.
Proven experience in AR development and design.
Creative thinking and proficiency in AR software.

careers.title: Biotech Research Scientist
careers.description: Leading biotechnological research initiatives with a focus on cybernetic augmentation.
requirements: PhD in Biotechnology, Bioengineering, or related field.
Experience in regenerative medicine and cybernetics.
Innovative thinker with a record of published research.
